Class SldMeteorSwarm

java.lang.Object
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldAdvCard
org.mio.progettoingsoft.advCards.sealed.SldMeteorSwarm
public final class SldMeteorSwarm extends SldAdvCard
Represents the sealed advanced card "Meteor Swarm", which simulates a sequence of meteors threatening the players' ships.

Players must react to each incoming meteor by choosing to use energy to defend or let the meteor hit. Each meteor affects multiple players, and the card processes them sequentially.

    • init

      public void init(GameServer game)
      Initializes the card and sets up player and meteor iteration. The first meteor will be processed once setNextMeteor() is called.
      Specified by:
      init in class SldAdvCard
      Parameters:
      game - the current game instance

    • setNextMeteor

      public void setNextMeteor()
      Advances to the next meteor in the sequence. Sets the card state to DICE_ROLL if there is another meteor, or FINALIZED if all meteors have been processed.

    • getActualMeteor

      public Meteor getActualMeteor()

    • setNextMeteor

      public void setNextMeteor(String nick, boolean destroyed, boolean energy)
      Resolves a player's interaction with the current meteor.

      The player can choose whether to destroy the meteor and whether to consume energy to do so. If all affected players have responded, the card progresses to the next meteor.

      Parameters:
      nick - the nickname of the responding player
      destroyed - true if the player destroyed the meteor
      energy - true if energy was consumed to block the meteor
      Throws:
      IncorrectFlyBoardException - if the player has already responded or is invalid
